parameters.label: The minimum base quality score
parameters.desc: Controls the --minq flag for the freyja variant command.

parameters.label: The minimum genome coverage
parameters.desc: This is the '--mincov' flag to the Freyja aggregate command.

parameters.label: Minimum lineage abundance for the plot command
parameters.desc: '--thresh' flag for the freyja plot command. This allows the user to define the minimum lineage abundance returned to the user

parameters.label: The minimum coverage depth minimum.
parameters.desc: controls the --depthcutoff value for the Freyja demix command. Sites with coverage less than the specified value are excluded

parameters.label: Excludes unconfirmed lineages from the analysis.
parameters.desc: Excludes unconfirmed lineages from the analysis.

parameters.label: Minimum lineage abundance
parameters.desc: '--eps' flag for the freyja demix command. Allows the user to define the minimum lineage abundance returned to the user

parameters.label: coverage estimate value
parameters.desc: The coverage value provides the 10x coverage estimate (percent of sites with 10 or greater reads. 10 is the default but can be modfied using the --covcut option in demix).

parameters.label: Timeseries plot interval
parameters.desc: Timeseries plot interval - controls the --interval flag of the freyja plot command [MS or D (month/day bins)]

parameters.label: Custom barcode path
parameters.desc: This is for the '--barcodes' flag to control the barcodes used in the demix command.

parameters.label: Sample metadata csv
parameters.desc: A .CSV with the input fastq file - if paired read use read 1 - and corresponding sampling date.

parameters.label: Keep all intermediate output from the pipeline
parameters.desc: Keep all intermediate output from the pipeline

parameters.label: Output Folder
parameters.desc: Path to which the output will be written. Defaults to the directory containing the input data.

parameters.label: File Basename
parameters.desc: Basename for the generated output files. Defaults to the basename of the input data.
